info.title: Laravel Post Scheduler API
info.description: API documentation for Laravel Post Scheduler project

get.summary: Get list of latest 50 activity logs with user details
Get posts analytics aggregated by platform
get.description: Retrieves comprehensive statistics about posts distribution and publishing success rate across all platforms

total_posts.description: Total number of posts scheduled for this platform

post.summary: Enable or disable platform for authenticated user

get.summary: Get paginated list of user's posts with filtering options

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter posts by status (draft, scheduled, published)

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter posts scheduled after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter posts scheduled before this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

platforms.description: Array of platform IDs where the post should be published

image.description: Image file to upload (alternative to image_url)

title: The title field is required
platforms: At least one platform must be selected

image.description: Image file to upload (alternative to image_url)

404.description: Post not found or not scheduled

message.example: Post not found or not scheduled

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log Model
ActivityLog.description: Tracks and records all significant user actions within the system for auditing and monitoring purposes

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to the user who performed the action

description.description: Detailed contextual information about the activity
description.example: User created a new post titled 'Summer Campaign'

created_at.description: Automatic timestamp of when the activity was logged

updated_at.description: Timestamp of last update (typically matches created_at)

user.description: Associated user data through Eloquent relationship

Platform.title: Platform
Platform.description: Represents a social media platform where posts can be published

id.description: Auto-incrementing unique identifier for the platform

name.description: The display name of the platform (e.g., Twitter, LinkedIn)

type.description: Category of the platform (e.g., social, professional, media)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the platform was added to the system

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the platform record was last updated

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a social media post that can be scheduled and published to multiple platforms

id.description: Auto-incrementing unique identifier for the post

title.description: The title/headline of the post (max 255 chars)

content.description: The main body content of the post

image_url.description: Optional URL to an associated image for the post

scheduled_at.description: The date/time when the post should be published. Null for immediate posting.

status.description: Current publication status of the post

user_id.description: ID of the user who created the post

created_at.description: Timestamp when the post was first created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the post was last updated

User.description: User model representing a registered application user
